title: France made treaty with new American nation - when

content.question: France negotiated a treaty of alliance with the new American nation in 1778 following

choices.label: the defeat of the British General Burgoyne at Saratoga
American naval victories on the Great Lakes
the dispatch of an American peace mission to Britain
a personal plea by George Washington

content.answer: the defeat of the British General Burgoyne at Saratoga

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
